media.title: The Shawshank Redemption
media.comment: A masterpiece of storytelling and character development.
media.quote: Get busy living, or get busy dying.

media.title: The Godfather
media.comment: A cinematic classic with unforgettable performances.
media.quote: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.

media.title: Pulp Fiction
media.comment: A non-linear narrative that redefined independent filmmaking.
media.quote: They call it a Royale with cheese.

media.title: Inception
media.quote: Your mind is the scene of the crime.

media.title: Interstellar
media.quote: Mankind was born on Earth. It was never meant to die here.

media.title: Forrest Gump
media.comment: A heartwarming story about an extraordinary life.
media.quote: Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.

media.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
media.author: Harper Lee
media.comment: A powerful story about justice and racial inequality.
media.quote: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it.

media.author: George Orwell
media.comment: A chilling dystopian novel that remains relevant today.

media.title: The Great Gatsby
media.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
media.comment: A classic novel about the American Dream.
media.quote: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.

media.title: The Hobbit
media.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
media.quote: In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.

media.title: The Catcher in the Rye
media.author: J.D. Salinger
media.comment: A classic novel about teenage angst and alienation.
media.quote: I'm the most terrific liar you ever saw in your life.

media.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
media.author: Yuval Noah Harari
media.comment: A thought-provoking look at human history.
media.quote: There is no justice in history.

media.title: Atomic Habits
media.author: James Clear
media.comment: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.
media.quote: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.
